item.description:
June's event will be a SUNDAY Meetup.

This month's topic: Read something new!

This is a followup to the May topic. We were struck by how few of us had read anything on either the Hugo or the Nebula ballot. It has me wondering, what's being published right now that will be among next year's nominees?

So, here's the challenge: Read something published in the last year. To make it easier, let's define it "since January 2006." That means you can use the latest awards ballots to find something. Now, get out there and check out the New Release shelf!

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Science Fiction Writers June Meetup
